title: GTA Online: Money Fronts
headline: GTA Online: Money Fronts
subtitle: Smoke on the Water
content:
Once you’ve set up your Car Wash, branch out into the dispensary business by acquiring Smoke on the Water.

Owning Vespucci Beach’s premier stash spot also rewards you with a permanent boost to all Weed Farm Sell Missions. Find Smoke on the Water weed strains around the map to earn some extra cash daily.

Purchase from Maze Bank Foreclosures or the For Sale sign outside the building.
